predicate.note: Frames file for 'rehash' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: The two men spent an hour at Exit 10 , [*-1] rehashing the event , `` [*-1] fulfilling the lifelong dream of a young boy now turned [*] 50 , '' Mr. Engelken says [*T*-2] .
